title: SCP-076-2

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Once per game, you may upgrade your fmk to overkilling rampage.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Upon spawning, SCP-076-2 is blackmailed on day 1 and roleblocked on night 1 due to regeneration inside SCP-076-1
- If you are roleblocked, you will stay home to kill your roleblocker. You cannot die to your own rampage. Same applies if you are attacked
- If you are jailed, you will kill your jailor if you aren't executed.
- **Degrading:**If you are hit with an attack level equal to or lower than the defense level, it goes down by one.
- Conversion Immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prevent those traitors from recontaining you at all costs.

desc:
Post 2525
*"Upon coming into contact with living humans, SCP-076-2 will enter a rage state in which it attempts to engage and kill all human beings encountered. To date, only the subject's death has been shown to be effective in ending these rampages."*
